name: GetUserNotificationSettings
summary: Dictionary object of parameters used to register the application with local notifications using the registerUserNotificationSettings method.

properties.name: alertStyle
properties.summary: The current alert style used to display notifications.

properties.name: authorizationStatus
properties.summary: The current authorization status for using notifications.

properties.name: categories
properties.summary: Set of categories of user notification actions required by the applicaiton to use.
properties.description: Only available in iOS < 10. iOS 10 and later returns notification settings more detailed, check the other attributes for more information.

properties.name: criticalAlertSetting
properties.summary: The authorization status to play sounds for critical alerts. Available in Titanium SDK 7.4.0 and later.

properties.name: providesAppNotificationSettings
properties.summary: A Boolean value indicating the system displays a button for in-app notification settings. Available in Titanium SDK 7.4.0 and later.

properties.name: types
properties.description: Only available in iOS < 10. iOS 10 and later returns notification settings more detailed, check the other attributes for more information.
